title: Design Ad Creative
description: A designer needs to create a set of display ads for a new campaign based on a creative brief.

tasks.description: Review the creative brief for key messaging, branding guidelines, and required ad sizes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands the core requirements for the ad visuals.

tasks.description: Create a visual design for the ads that incorporates the brand's logo, colors, and the main call-to-action.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a design that is on-brand and visually appealing.

tasks.description: Export the design in all required sizes (e.g., 300x250, 728x90, 160x600).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a complete set of ad files in the correct dimensions.
